actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

official_title: A bill to ratify the agreement between the State of Idaho and the Idaho Power Company dated October 25, 1984.

summary.text: Ratifies an agreement between the State of Idaho and the Idaho Power Company dated October 25, 1984, regarding electric utility water rights in the Snake River Basin. Deems such agreement to be in accordance with the requirements for issuance of a license under the Federal Power Act. Declares that Federal or Indian reserved water rights in the Snake River Basin are not affected by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to ratify the agreement between the State of Idaho and the Idaho Power Company dated October 25, 1984.
